title: Ticket #1141: default session duration is 3600 in 7.5.0
description:
The param table contains an entry for SEC_DEFAULT_SESSION_DURATION. It is set to 3600. This has two probably unintended effects:

  1. daemons such as startds advertising to a collector will only get a 1h session instead of a 1 day session, which was the previous default.

  2. tools such as condor_status get a 1h session instead of a 60s session.

I am removing this entry from the param table, because the param table is not currently appropriate for params that are looked up with SecMan::getSecSetting().
